titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation & enquiry concerning matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men, of every parish within the diocess of Oxon, in the first episcopal visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God, Walter, by divine permission, Lord Bishop of Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Oxford. Bishop (1665-1671 : Blandford)
Blandford, Walter, 1619-1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
